title: The Kasuga Gongen Miracles, Vol. 2
marks:
Title, Inscriptions

Inscriptions inside when rolled, title adhered to top
description: text followed by a long image of a man in black shogunal dress sitting on verandah looking outward at a large, covered rickshaw with a figure inside, several men stand ready to pull rickshaw away; a line of men in black shogunal dress sit on either side of the rickshaw; many others in grey with face coverings look in; red torii gate with shrine roof at bottom, and a lively crowd; large cloudbank separates the scene, and at L another large wooden structure with green shades holds a sitting figure in black who overlooks a procession of very well dressed men; in the back, a group of men carry a koto; second text block followed by graphic battle scene; third text block followed by another scene of men in white pulling a large rickshaw away from verandah; two groups of well-dressed onlookers flank the rickshaw; inside the building with the verandah, a man in white sits with a woman; they are surrounded by beautifully painted walls, and a cloudbank
